<h3 id="X24851">X(24851) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: GARCIA-REFLECTION TO N-OBVERSE OF X(1)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4-(b^2+b*c+c^2)*a^2-(b^3+c^3)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(24851) = 2*X(10)-3*X(17677) = 4*X(1125)-3*X(4234) = 5*X(1698)-6*X(16052)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(1)</p>
<p>X(24851) lies on these lines:
{1,30}, {2,24850}, {3,3944}, {4,240}, {5,17596}, {8,4683}, {10,190}, {11,24852}, {21,3120}, {35,17719}, {36,15952}, {40,1756}, {145,17491}, {148,257}, {171,1770}, {238,23537}, {405,17889}, {442,846}, {497,3976}, {498,17601}, {513,18178}, {516,5255}, {522,21134}, {535,15955}, {726,5015}, {740,1330}, {896,3648}, {982,1479}, {987,19645}, {988,1699}, {1010,4425}, {1046,1834}, {1054,4187}, {1125,4234}, {1193,5057}, {1698,16052}, {1714,7262}, {1738,12572}, {2292,2475}, {2476,4414}, {2478,24174}, {2549,3061}, {2650,14450}, {2782,3865}, {2887,7283}, {3338,24217}, {3496,5254}, {3583,3670}, {3585,4424}, {3663,4911}, {3735,7748}, {3750,13407}, {3821,13740}, {3914,5247}, {3923,16062}, {3924,11114}, {3953,4857}, {3980,17533}, {4205,24342}, {4292,24210}, {4309,17715}, {4385,4660}, {4415,5293}, {4418,5051}, {4642,5080}, {4650,5292}, {4653,11263}, {4655,10449}, {4703,9534}, {4872,24214}, {4887,6744}, {5046,24443}, {5129,7613}, {5134,16600}, {5302,21949}, {5358,24436}, {5988,6998}, {6175,21674}, {6536,14005}, {6650,17685}, {6651,17673}, {6656,17738}, {7847,18061}, {8040,17551}, {9612,17594}, {9670,17597}, {10896,17595}, {11110,12579}, {13741,24169}, {16478,19785}, {18483,24239}</p>
<p>
X(24851) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1046, 1834), (5255, 13161), (24852, 11)<br>
X(24851) = anticomplement of X(24850)<br>
X(24851) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4, 24248, 986), (21, 3120, 24161), (3782, 6284, 1)<br>
</p>
